titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Adjustment Act to permit marketing orders to provide for paid advertising for Florida-grown strawberries.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Domestic and Foreign Marketing.
Committee on Agriculture requested executive comment from Agriculture Department.
Committee on Agriculture received executive comment from Agriculture Department. Favorable.

calendar.text: Committee on Agriculture. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

committee.subcommittee: Domestic and Foreign Marketing and Product Promotion
committee.name: Senate Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Amends the Agricultural Adjustment Act to provide for paid advertising for Florida-grown strawberries under marketing orders.
